TEXT.TITLE: TOLL BROTHERS <TOL> OPENS NEW ENGLAND OFFICE
TEXT.BODY: Toll Brothers Inc said it formed a New England divisional office, which will be located in Hopkinton, Mass. The office will open April 15. The company said the new office opening underscores its commitment to establishing a position throughout the Northeast corridor. Reuter
